thread.title: BRIEF-Telus Corp Files For Mixed Shelf Offering Of Up To $3.5 Bln With SEC

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telus Corp Files For Mixed Shelf Offering Of Up To $3.5 Bln With SEC
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Telus Corp:
* TELUS CORP FILES FOR MIXED SHELF OFFERING OF UP TO $3.5 BILLION WITH THE U.S. SEC Source text: ( bit.ly/2rFif1D ) Further company coverage:
